screen_desc: The screenshot displays a mobile version of the Best Buy website's shopping cart page. At the top, there is a search bar with the query "razer kraken" and suggested search results related to the product. The page also includes a message indicating the cart is empty and offers the option to create an account for reward points. The bottom portion of the screen shows links for "Saved Items" and a menu for feedback.

Add the selected 'razer kraken' product to the shopping cart.
